title: Clockmaker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Send someone through time each night, roleblocking them and preventing anyone from visiting them.
- If you send someone through time a second time, you will cut them out of reality, killing them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your clock starts at eight o'clock.
- You will be notified of what time your clock shows at the end of each night.
- If you visit a good role, your clock will advance five hours.
- If you visit a mafia role, your clock will advance three hours.
- If you visit a neutral role, your clock will turn back two hours.
- Ignores roleblock immunity.
- You can't target Peasants

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Turn your clock to twelve o'clock.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4447
*The Clockmaker was perplexed. His clocks would vanish when he visited certain people, and new clocks he had never built would manifest when he visited others. Worst of all, his clocks always read the wrong time - they wouldn't change at all some days, and would be too fast on others. Sometimes, he'd walk for minutes, and be told he'd been gone for days.*
